name: ShufflePoker
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shuffle poker
des:
Shuffle Poker is a poker game that you can play alone. A screen-attached device is needed to play.
Saying next cards, 5 cards are dealt at a time . The score of hand-ranking is as follows:

Nothing: 0 points
One Pair: 40 points
Two Pair: 80 points
Trips: 120 points
Straight: 200 points
Flush: 200 points
Full House: 200 points
Quads: 200 points
Straight Flush: 400 points

How to innvocate: Alexa, open Shuffle Poker
Open next 5 cards: Next, Go, Next cards
Reset: reset, restart, shuffle,
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
